Articles.Content: This is just a small thing, but it's really annoying. Recently I sent a satellite into the orbit, and it has few antennas. I deployed them so the satellite looks cool. And once I transmit the data antenna retracts and I can't manually deploy it anymore, it only deploys when it's transmitting data. So it'd be nice if this get fixed in the next update, thanks in advance ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
